apiKey.name: API key
apiKey.description: Providing your own NexusMods API key is <c=redd>required</c> for Nickel to be able to perform update checks for mods hosted on NexusMods.

message.missingApiKey: NexusMods API key is not provided in mod settings. It is <c=redd>required</c> for Nickel to be able to perform update checks for mods hosted on NexusMods.
message.unauthorized: There was a problem authorizing with NexusMods - is your provided API key revoked? Update it in mod settings.
